page.title: 11REDEVELOPMENT IN ROBOROUGH
page.content: At the moment we have a lot of farmland in the area that is about to be redeveloped. Darklake is one of these farms, also Broadley,Porsham and Roborough. There are going to be two more industrial estates built.The large estate will have several smaller factories,and the other area is for Plessey.Plessey is already being built.A new Tesco supermarket is half built,and will be open in 1986. There will probably be a newsagent, a post office, a bank and a chemist in the Tesco precinct.The Woolwell housing estate will have 1200 houses. Some are already built. The houses will be built by different developers so that they do not all look the same. There will be a primary school, four play parks and open space for walking. There are plans for a health centre and possibly a community hall.
